abstract: DuPont will eliminate 1,700 jobs in Delaware, its home state, and thousands more worldwide as it prepares to merge with Dow Chemical.
lead_paragraph: DuPont will cut 1,700 jobs in its home state, Delaware, and thousands more globally as it prepares for its merger with Dow Chemical.

headline.main: DuPont to Cut 1,700 Jobs in U.S., and More Globally
headline.print_headline: Dupont To Cut 1,700 Jobs in U.S.,. and More Globally

snippet: DuPont will cut 1,700 jobs in its home state, Delaware, and thousands more globally as it prepares for its merger with Dow Chemical.
